price: 7. Kasi ya soló, buku ya bato ya mabe ekozala okati ya sidjíne.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
